thread.title: Top travel photos of the week

title: Top travel photos of the week
persons: CATHAL MCNAUGHTON CATHAL MCNAUGHTON WOLFGANG RATTAY WOLFGANG RATTAY
JONATHAN ERNST KHAM NAVESH CHITRAKAR UESLEI MARCELINO RONEN ZVULUN RONEN ZVULUN
LUKE MACGREGOR NEIL HALL LUKE MACGREGOR LUKE MACGREGOR Rob Stothard Dan Kitwood CHARLES PLATIAU
text:
Top travel photos of the week Last updated 05:00, July 4 2015 CATHAL MCNAUGHTON CATHAL MCNAUGHTON WOLFGANG RATTAY WOLFGANG RATTAY FABIAN BIMMER LUKE MACGREGOR NEIL HALL LUKE MACGREGOR LUKE MACGREGOR Rob Stothard Dan Kitwood CHARLES PLATIAU ANTARA FOTO VINCENT WEST VINCENT WEST STEPHANE MAHE JONATHAN ERNST KHAM NAVESH CHITRAKAR UESLEI MARCELINO RONEN ZVULUN RONEN ZVULUN 
Tourists relax in a private swimming pool in the village of Oia on the island of Santorini, Greece. 
A man watches the sun set on the island of Santorini, Greece. 
Male polar bear Luka keeps cool in the water during a hot summer day at the zoo of Wuppertal, Germany. 
A pink flamingo plays in the water at a zoo in Germany. 
A swimmer leaps into a pool in Hamburg, northern Germany. 
Australian singer and musician Lija Rolavs, who performs as Princess Freesia, is caught by a wave at Brighton beach in Britain. Britain's Meteorological Office has warned of the possibility of heatwave conditions, with temperatures reaching their highest of the year this week. 
Tourists pose as a friend photographs them in front of Buckingham Palace during hot weather in central London. 
Lifeguards Chris Payne, left, and Nina Bassam keep watch on a hot summer day at Brighton beach in Britain. 
Sun hats are seen for sale in converted telephone boxes at Brighton beach. 
Two women try to cool off in a fountain outside the Southbank Centre in London, England. The UK is currently experiencing a heatwave, with temperatures reaching 35C. 
A spectator relaxes in the sunshine on a boat on day two of the Henley Royal Regatta in Henley-on-Thames, England. This year is the event's 176th year. 
A man enjoys the sun sitting in a chair in the Palais Royal Garden in central Paris, France. A widespread, long-lasting heatwave spread across much of France, the UK, Belgium, the Netherlands and western Germany. 
Tourists visit Borobudur Temple in Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia. 
A young woman is drenched in wine during the Batalla de Vino (Wine Battle) in Haro, northern Spain. Every year thousands of people celebrate the day of the patron saint of the town, San Pedro, with a trek to the mountainous crags of Bilibio. Following a mass in honour of the fifth century hermit, St Felices de Bilibio, a giant battle ensues with participants using any method available to soak each other with cheap wine. The tradition appears to have come about after various participants, following a night of drinking, thought it amusing to stain their white festival costumes with red wine, according to early newspaper reports. 
A young woman is drenched in wine during the Batalla de Vino (Wine Battle) in Haro, northern Spain. 
Men walk near a sculpture entitled 'Resolution des forces en presence' by French artist Vincent Mauger during a visit to 'A Journey to Nantes' (Le Voyage a Nantes) art festival in Nantes, France. 
The Obama family's dogs Bo, left, and Sunny are on hand as the White House lifts a 40-year ban on photos during public tours. 
Houses are seen reflected on Hoai river in Vietnam's central ancient town of Hoi An, a UNESCO heritage site. 
A man falls while playing in the mud during the Asar Pandhra festival in Pokhara valley, west of Nepal's capital Kathmandu. Farmers in Nepal celebrate the festival to mark the commencement of rice crop planting in paddy fields. 
A snowman is seen at the El Colorado ski centre at Los Andes Mountain range, near Santiago, Chile. Due to a severe drought, the ski centre uses artificial snow machines to keep the ski slopes ready for tourists and local residents. 
Colourful umbrellas decorate a pedestrian mall in downtown Jerusalem. The installation, made of some 1000 umbrellas, is part of a campaign to attract visitors to the city's centre. 
Colourful umbrellas decorate a pedestrian mall in downtown Jerusalem. 1 of 22 
Here is our round up of the top travel photos from around the world. 
Do you have a favourite? Let us know in the comments.
